name: Dream Broker
overview:
Dream Broker is a Finnish online video software company. We offer cloud-based software for creating, editing and sharing online videos. Our solution enables more efficient training, learning and internal communication.

With us, anyone in the organization can instantly create and deliver self-made video content in a secure enterprise environment. Our vision is to make online videos available in everyone’s daily business – anywhere, anytime and on any device.

Dream Broker was founded in 2007 and currently has over 60 employees. The company is one of the fastest-growing companies in Finland with hundreds of loyal customers and an annual growth rate of over 100% since its launch. In 2012 Dream Broker won Deloitte’s “Technology Fast 50” in Finland after growing astonishing 2712% during 2007-2011. In 2011, Dream Broker’s annual turnover was €1.47 million, and the target for 2012 is approximately €3 million.

Dream Broker is headquartered in Helsinki and has an office in Stockholm as well. Next one will be opened in Copenhagen in the winter 2012. The organization consists of young, innovative and highly educated people from the domains of technology, business and social sciences. Our aim is to become a significant international player in the digital online video software market by 2015.
